chunks.lyrics: Title: "Abigail", taken from the King Diamond album Abigail.
Abigail, I know your in control of her brain
And Iknow that your'e the one that's speaking through her
Guitar solo 1. (first bar is two guitars in harmony)
Abigail, don't you think I know what you've done
He will know how to get her soul back
Our time is out Re member the stairs
b b(bend 9 only) b b/P b H P
b1/2 H b P b P b P
TP TP TP TP TP TP TP TP TP TP TP TP
TP TP P P Harm(bend and slowly release)
Abigail, nothing I can do but give in
Abigail. you ought to be re-born when you died
If anyone has solos to any King Diamond or Mercyful Fate songs please drop me
a line at pige@deakin.edu.au, I would appreciate any small transcriptions that
people have done, it would be a great help as I'm trying to transcribe as many
as I can. Even if you don't have any transcriptions to hear from any
King Diamond/Mercyful Fate fans would be cool.
